name: Multi Process Node.js Example
description: A barebones Node.js app using Express 4

env.NODE_ENV: choose one of ('development' | 'production'): when development, it uses dotenv, to read the local .env file, that's the only difference
env.TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET: comma separated keywords to track, eg. nodejs,node.js,risingstack,microservice,micro-service
